channel.title: Antoine Dodson arrested for possession of marijuana
channel.description:
http://www.tmz.com/2011/04/23/antoine-dodson-arrested-marijuana-possession-huntsville-alabama-police-department/
I lol'd for quite a bit.

item.title: Antoine Dodson arrested for possession of marijuana
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:11, topic:392292”][quote author=rant link=topic=489459.msg3578475#msg3578475 date=1303613262]

[quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=489459.msg3578458#msg3578458 date=1303612040]

pssh, i was gonna post this, but he’d find my ip address and climb through my firewall
[/quote]what makes this funny is that antoine dodson once said climbing in your windows and we gon find you.

so what rant did here was use things on his computer. and your computer has an ip address and most computers have firewalls. so what rant did was make it a computer joke.

THAT’S the funny part! dont you guys get it??


[/quote]Its so random, it may be worth it.[/quote]
oops sorry the link broke,

Read full topic
